Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

Class ViewModel

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.ViewModel
public class ViewModel extends Object
View model of the client of the Masters of Renaissance game.

      Returns:

    • getDevCardDiscountedCost

      public Map<String,​Integer> getDevCardDiscountedCost​(int id)
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the development card the discounted cost of which needs to be computed
      Returns:
      the cost of the development card discounted by the active leader cards of the local player

    • getPlayerDevelopmentCards

      public List<List<Optional<ReducedDevCard>>> getPlayerDevelopmentCards​(String nickname)
      Retrieves the development cards owned by a player. Empty slots are represented by empty lists.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player whose development cards need to be retrieved
      Returns:
      all the development cards in the player's slots

    • getPlayerDevelopmentSlots

      public List<Optional<ReducedDevCard>> getPlayerDevelopmentSlots​(String nickname)
      Retrieves the topmost development cards in a player's development slots. If a slot is empty the corresponding position in the list contains a null element.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player whose topmost development cards need to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a list containing, for each slot, the optional topmost development card

    • getPlayerFaithPoints

      public int getPlayerFaithPoints​(String nickname)
      Retrieves a player's current faith points.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player whose faith points are to be returned
      Returns:
      the faith points of the selected player

    • isPlayerActive

      public boolean isPlayerActive​(String nickname)
      Gets the activity/inactivity status of a player.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player whose state to be returned
      Returns:

    • getPlayerLeaderCards

      public List<ReducedLeaderCard> getPlayerLeaderCards​(String nickname)
      Retrieves the leader cards hand of a player.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player whose leader cards hand needs to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the reduced leader cards owned by the player

    • getPlayerActiveLeaderCards

      public List<ReducedLeaderCard> getPlayerActiveLeaderCards​(String nickname)
      Retrieves only the active leader cards hand of a player.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player whose active leader cards hand needs to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the reduced (active) leader cards owned by the player

    • getPlayerLeadersCount

      public int getPlayerLeadersCount​(String nickname)
      Retrieves the count of leader cards of a player.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player whose number of leader cards needs to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the number of leader cards owned by the player

    • getPlayerProductions

      public List<ReducedResourceTransactionRecipe> getPlayerProductions​(String nickname)
      Retrieves the list of productions available to a player.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player whose list of available productions needs to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the reduced recipes owned by the player, including:
      • the base production
      • the visible development cards' productions
      • the active leader cards' productions

    • getPlayerShelves

      public List<ReducedResourceContainer> getPlayerShelves​(String nickname)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the player's warehouse shelves and depots
